successes.title: The Quarter Century Pant | A 25 Year Guarantee
successes.description: HELP US MAKE A BETTER PAIR OF PANTS: Made in America and backed by a 25 year guarantee.

Pledges.description: HELP US MAKE A BETTER PAIR OF PANTS and let's challenge the industry together to make longer lasting clothes. Contribute $1 and receive a thank you card and a picture of THE QUARTER CENTURY PANTS.
THE QUARTER CENTURY SHORTS in the size and color of your choice. These shorts are GUARANTEED to last 25 YEARS and come with FREE shipping (US).
EARLY BIRD | QUARTER CENTURY PANTS in the size of your choice. This LIMITED RUN of 100 pants will be khaki colored and come with a UNIQUE PRODUCTION NUMBER.
YOUR VERY OWN QUARTER CENTURY PANTS in the size and color of your choice. These pants are GUARANTEED to last 25 YEARS and come with FREE shipping (US).
YOUR VERY OWN QUARTER CENTURY PANTS + THE COMPANION BELT in the size and color of your choice. These pants are GUARANTEED to last 25 YEARS and come with FREE shipping (US).
DOUBLE THE QUARTER CENTURY PANTS in the size and color of your choice. These pants are GUARANTEED to last 25 YEARS and come with FREE shipping (US).
TRIPLE THE QUARTER CENTURY PANTS in the size and color of your choice. These pants are GUARANTEED to last 25 YEARS and come with FREE shipping (US).
QUADRUPLE THE QUARTER CENTURY PANTS in the size and color of your choice. These pants are GUARANTEED to last 25 YEARS and come with FREE shipping (US).
